´´mese ki kalhi aanandaya, mama pawituwu ee maraya hata mese kiwemi. ´´pawituwu maraya, yamthak kal mage bhikshu shrawakayoda, bhikshuni shrawikawoda, daksha nowannahu wethda, nohikmethda, mahath danumak aththo nowethda, boho de gana asuwahu (dana gaththahu) nowannahuda, dharmadhara nowannahuda, lokoththara dharmayata anuwa pilipadinno nowannahuda, yahapathwa pilipadinnahu wethda(??nowethda), dharmayata anuwa hasirenno nowethda, thamange aacharya matha igena nokiyannahu wethda, deshana nokarannahu wethda, nopanawathda, nopihitathda, wiwrutha nokarannahuda, wibhaga nokarannahuda, prakata nokarannahuda, upannawu anya wadayan hethu sahithawa, karunu sahithawa hondin nigraha(??wigraha) kota niwanata pamunuwana dharmayak kota deshana nokarannahu wethda eethak piriniwan mama nopannemi´´yi kiwemi. ´´yamthak kal mage upasaka shrawakayoda, upasika shrawikawoda daksha nowethda, nohikmethda, mahath danumak aththo nowethda, boho de gana asu aththo (danno) nowethda, dharmadhara nowethda, dharmanu dharmayehi yuktha nowethda, yahapathwa pilipadinno nowethda, dharmayata anuwa hasirenno nowethda, thamange aacharya matha igena nokiyathda, deshana nokerethda, nopanawathda, nopihitathda, wiwrutha nokarathda, wibhaga nokarathda eethak mama piriniwan nopannemi´´yi kiwemi. ´´yamthak kal mage me siyaluma shasana marga brahmachayryawa sampurna bhawayata nopaminiyeda, diyunuwata nopaminiyeda, ee ee dishabhagayehi pathira nopawathneda, boho diwya manushyayan wisin prakasha karana lada bawata mopamineda ee thak kal piriniwan nopannemi´´yi kiwemi.
